showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ payment or get towed.   I will never buy another thing from there.   Used to stop in and buy fuel. Do laundry , shower and eat and then sleep.   Never again.  This place just lost all my business.   My husband never stops there ‚Ä¶

Hooray!!!! No more paid parking, they took it out. So now back to Free TRUCK PARKING, 50 gallons gets you a shower. Back to how it used to be. Thanks Ute MTN. Travel Center.  Now they should get there customers back. I'll be staying there ‚Ä¶

Truckers, be aware it's paid parking now.
$2/hour, $20 for 24 hours (shower included).
They got a guy cruising around the lot and checking parking permits.
It was my last time stopping here (didn't have hours to go anywhere else).

$20.00 all paid parking
Includes free shower & free refill

Very clean truck stop,  nice employees which is refreshing. 20 bucks to park but you get a free clean shower out of it. Upstairs they have a drivers lounge also clean and a few tv‚Äôs and plenty of seats.

‚Ä¶ and that gets packed immediately it is $20 to park but if you pay the $20 you get a choice between a free shower or a free large soft drink and there seems to always be parking. Staff is friendly and helpful, and hey if you're bored ‚Ä¶

Plenty of parking, clean restrooms and showers, lots of laundry, but they don't know how to turn the AC on upstairs because it was hotter than the devils sack especially with no fan inside. Also if you're a team or couple even if you use ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ stops, I find this one to be one of the my top favorites. All staff is friendly, laundry prices are excellent, showers and bathrooms are actually clean, and parking is $20 for the day  comes with a shower and coffee.I almost forgot the ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Was told 2 dollars an hour 20 for 24. Comes with a shower and a coffee. Parking and shower with fuel. ‚Ä¶

Arrived at 8pm, everything is closed. Lights are out, toilet and shower are not available.

The homies that work there are really down to earth.just like your brother that cool. Besides that it quite and duct from the road. Showers is super clean, but not new eaten is very limited. DEF IT‚ÄôS ONLY ON LANE 18. THERE‚ÄôS NO OTHER DEF ON ‚Ä¶

Great place everyone was super nice. Even got a shower right away no wait.

Seemed like an ok place. The shower I had was a bit tiny but they were clean and refreshing. The clerks were kind and courteous. As for the parking, just follow suit. There aren't any lines painted. Drivers typically park wherever they can ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText:
They have the best shower service! Very clean and well equipped, warm and pretty good. the laundry was great too, the price is the cheapest, staffs were so friendly.

Thank you, I had a really nice experience üôè ‚Ä¶

7/12/25 15:30 Shower #3 - I just had the BEST shower experience at a Loves, perhaps of all time! It was SO NICE to actually take a shower in room with GREAT AIR CONDITIONING at a Loves. It also had great water pressure and was clean. ‚Ä¶

My husband and I are truck drivers and stopped to take a shower. We get free showers from all our fuel points. When we got there, it was early afternoon. The whole place was busy. It was a 45- 55 minute wait for a shower. Not a big deal, we ‚Ä¶

This travel stop almost has everything you need for your road trip, and their gas is lower compared to this area.

Their restrooms are clean. They also have a laundry room and shower room.

Gas

Food

Shower

Laundry

Some essential items for driving

This Love Travel Stop has it all.

I wish that one day Love Travel Stop could install EV fast charge.

It would be nice if there would be pads for the pedestrian to the Subway.

‚Ä¶ of these stores. Always very helpful and very personable. Showers are reasonable priced and it's nice if traveling with your significant other because they allow you to shower together for the same price as 1 person. Makes me feel more ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ criminals robbing the middle class. Truck drivers are being taken advantage of. I had no drive time left so I paid. I will never plan to park here again. They have nothing to offer for $20 but a free shower that‚Äôs only good for 24hours.

First off went into truck stop to shower and do laundry and find showers are upstairs no elevator had to tote all up stairs ..I did find clean shower stalls and washers were also in clean condition..nice break room with big screen tv. ‚Ä¶
Great place for a shower nice clean restrooms and a great view

I was on this site 04/27/2020 at 5:37 pm and could not get a shower, at the front desk told me that they closed at 5:30 pm .... something ridiculous for a travel plaza that offers service  of showers, what do you think ?

showerReviews.reviewText: It's small to be an express. Lol but they have laundry,  tv lounge and 3 showers,  very nice showers!  When I went there were no hot food options,  no sales on anything. It's just a stop and shower kinda truck stop ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ on July 19th, they patiently explained to me why, so my truck had to stay here overnight, and when I came to take a shower, they gave me a bathroom without even checking my membership, even though I am an old guy in TA^_^. Since you take ‚Ä¶

Used to be good but the homeless have taken over.  Last few times I wanted to do laundry they have taken over the laundry room and the shower.  This time some wacked out guy had dirty clothes spread out on the table and was spraying ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ .  The burgers were great!! Got up the next morning to take a shower,  they charged us $16, ok that's an ok price I guess,   got into the shower room went to turn the water on and no water pressure at all!!! Took you 30 mins just to ‚Ä¶
I do not know how but they really made their shower service stand out in a positive way. Six stars from a dirty traveler.

‚Ä¶ more expensive by an average of $0.40. The shower costs $18 but only one of the three cabins works. having paid for the shower and after waiting for a long time, I left there without taking a shower. If you want an inflated cost for your ‚Ä¶

Had to use a shower token just to have a clean restroom to use.  The men's public restroom is absolutely disgusting and this is from someone that lives on the road.  I dont mean like it looks like a few guys just used it.  It looks like it ‚Ä¶

Got to be here early if want parking space. Great service. Small place and only one wash machine worked. Water was very hot for a shower, gave me life. Only 3 showers. The works are very nice and will help.

‚Ä¶ berth and it was closed... for no fuel. I get that fuel is the main selling product for the company but to shut down literally EVERYTHING because you have no fuel? We just wanted a shower. Had to walk next door to Love's and take a shower.
